net.retrodeck.supermodel.desktop CC0-1.0 GPL-3.0 supermodel Launcher Browse and play your supermodel quest collection.
supermodel Launcher is a desktop GUI frontend that allows to browse and play to supermodel quests, which are video games made with the supermodel game engine.
https://www.supermodel-games.org/data/en/entities/article/old/2016/07/images/supermodel-launcher.png
